previous.excerpt: The Developer’s Homepage ___ Hackertab, a handy extension to help developers stay up-to-date with the latest tech happenings. It’s fully customizable, for frontend, backend, full-stack, mobile, data scientists… bref, for all developers.
previous.title: Hackertab.dev - Hottest programming trends right in your tab 🔥

localize.description: 开发者的主页__Hackertab，一个方便的扩展，帮助开发者掌握最新的技术动态。它是完全可定制的，适用于前端、后端、全栈、移动、数据科学家......适合所有开发者。
